mapper.select: SELECT r.gradename, COUNT(*) - ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM roombooking WHERE bookroomgrade = r.gradename and (roombooking.checkin < to_date(#{from},'MM/DD/YYYY') and roombooking.checkout > to_date(#{to},'MM/DD/YYYY')) ) AS reservableornot FROM room r GROUP BY r.gradename
mapper.insert: insert into roombooking select b.bookno,b.bookdate,to_date(#{checkOut},'MM/DD/YYYY'),#{bfcheckbox},null,#{gradename} from book b where b.username = #{username}
